title: So client wont load the home page
body: So I open up my client to find this showing. Anybody here know how to fix this?

replies.body:
This may be an issue with the updated client.  Try running on the legacy client and see if everything looks back to normal there:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!

It all works on the old client, it's just not working on the new client. Should I send in a support ticket?
(I've completely uninstalled and reinstalled the game and it still does this on the new client)

Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for 'Reinstall' and 'Clean Uninstall', then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn't carry over, then reinstalls the game.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Annie_HextechSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160224210722

Let us know if your issue is resolved or not.

(Credits to Targon's Blade for the last step)

The error states "internet disconnected" and since it's not an issue with corrupt files; [Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
